description: Aggressive V-shaped curve emphasizing sub-bass punch, rhythmic kick, and bright, spacious highs, while reducing boxy mids.

bands.notes: Maximum boost for sub-bass rumble and physical impact (crucial for Dance/EDM).
Strong boost for the main kick drum punch and bassline power.
Small boost to maintain low-end warmth without overwhelming the mix.
Cut to prevent 'boominess' or low-mid clutter from muddying the bass.
Moderate cut to 'scoop' the midrange, making the mix sound cleaner and more energetic.
Slight cut, maintaining the mid scoop to focus attention on the rhythm and highs.
Small boost for synth and lead instrument presence.
Moderate boost for vocal/synth clarity and high-hat attack.
Strong boost for high-end sparkle, brilliance, and perceived 'air' and reverb.
Moderate boost for high-frequency extension and modern brightness.
